Translations.Text: Yakhana prabala kampane yamina prakampita kara habe
ara yamina tara bhara bera kare debe
ara manusa balabe, â€˜era ki hala [1]?â€™
Sedina yamina tara brttanta barnana karabe
karana apanara raba take nirdesa diyechena
Sedina manusa bhinna bhinna dale bera habe [1], yate taderake tadera krtakarma dekhana yaya
ke'u anu parimana satkaja karale se ta dekhabe
Ara ke'u anu parimana asatkaja karale se ta'o dekhabe
